entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
